tests.name: Verify User Login Functionality
tests.objective: To ensure that users can successfully log in to the application with valid credentials.
tests.precondition: User has a registered account and valid login credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the application login page.
steps.expectedResult: The login page is displayed with username and password fields.
The username and password fields are populated.
User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard page.
